welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Welver, Germany! This quaint town is known for its picturesque landscapes and charming shops. We invite you to immerse yourself in our culture and discover all that Welver has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dortmund Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1

terminals.name: Terminal 2
